{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$719.3K in 2021-2022** on contracts with BAY CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT.

Across 6 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (83%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 7% and the average number of amendments was 2.2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$766.8K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.35 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.9M. The longest contract was 1.83 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
